name: NSUserInterfaceCompression
desc: A protocol that describes how a UI control should redisplay when space is restricted.

items.name: func compress(withPrioritizedCompressionOptions: [NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions])
items.desc: Compress the view by applying the specified compression options.

items.name: func minimumSize(withPrioritizedCompressionOptions: [NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions]) -> NSSize
items.desc: Returns the minimum size a view can achieve by applying the supplied compression options.

items.name: var activeCompressionOptions: NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions
items.desc: The compression options that are currently applied to the view.
